00047 class DnsSdProxy
00048 {
00049     friend class DnsSdServicesList; // In order to access to mutex
00050 
00051 public:
00052     DnsSdProxy();
00053     virtual ~DnsSdProxy();
00054 
00055     static bool IsEnabled();
00056

00060     static bool RemoveClient( DnsSdProxyClient * Client, bool NotifyAsIfServicesDisappear = false );
00061 
00062     static bool WaitForChanges(unsigned int TimeToWait);
00063 
00064 private:
00065     // Storage of Services
00066     // Local class definition in order to manage Services
00067     class DnsSdServiceInstanceManager : public DnsSdService
00068     {
00069         friend class DnsSdProxy;
00070 
00071     private:
00072         // A way to construct such object using a mother class instance
00073         DnsSdServiceInstanceManager( DnsSdService& ToCopy );
00074         virtual ~DnsSdServiceInstanceManager();
00075 
00076         bool IsPresent; 
00077     };
00078 
00079     // Init static data for the DnsSdProx class
00080 
00081     // To protect all my private stuff...
00082     static ReentrantMutex Locker;
00083 
00084     // A counter of instances
00085     static unsigned int InstancesCount;
00086 
00087     // Number of "copies" of the service in use
00088     static unsigned int CurrentNumberOfServicesListCopies;
00089 
00090     // A boolean saying that we need to remove services in the list
00091     static bool NeedToCleanupServicesList;
00092 
00093     // A list to contain all the services
00094     static SimpleList<DnsSdServiceInstanceManager*> ServicesList;
00095

00097 
00098     static BrowseForDNSSDService * ServiceBroswer;
00099 
00100     // manage futur notification paradigm

00102

00105 
00106     // Browsing of Services
